name: Electro Rush
description:
Are you ready to rush???

Escape from the lab jumping over obstacles and platforms.

But you must hurry, or your battery will run out!

Can you make it like a real speed runner?


CONTROLS - Keyboard and Mouse

WASD - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Mouse Right Click - Dive

CONTROLS - XBOX Controller

Left Stick - Move

A - Jump

X - Dive

Game made by Gustavo Giardi (GRD Lab)

Music by Kevin MacLeod
